copyCoordinateVectorAsAtomChildren

public static void copyCoordinateVectorAsAtomChildren(org.xmlcml.cml.element.CMLMolecule fromMolecule,
                                                      org.xmlcml.cml.element.CMLMolecule toMolecule,
                                                      java.lang.String prefix,
                                                      java.lang.String localDictRef)
treats the 3D atomCoordinates as atom children of another molecule the coordinates in fromAtom are wrapped in a CMLVector3 and added as children of corresponding atoms in toMolecule. The Vector is given a dictRef of prefix:localDictRef atom correspondence is done by ids. Non-existent atoms in toMolecule are ignored no atoms or molecules are deleted

Parameters:
fromMolecule -
toMolecule -
prefix - for dictRef
localDictRef -
